473750.name: Feudums
473750.description:
YOUR NOBLE HOUSE MUST PREVAIL

Forge your legacy in a living medieval world where the changing seasons set the rhythm of life, but strategy, diplomacy, and ambition decide your fate. Lead your noble house, command vassals, expand your lands and wage wars — but true success isn’t just about power. Build alliances, broker peace, and outmaneuver rivals in a grand strategy where ambition and opportunity often clash with virtue and empathy. And remember: every opponent is a real player, weighing your every move.

Feudums aims to be a heartfelt tribute and an ambitious blend of turn-based 4X, grand strategy, and persistent online play — without some long-standing frustrations of the genres.

NO PAY-TO-WIN GIMMICKS, NO GRIND. STRATEGY REIGNS SUPREME!

  • No paywalls blocking gameplay. Everyone plays on equal ground.

  • No paid gameplay advantages. Pick cosmetics for style but without tilting the scales!

  • No energy bars or artificial slowdowns. Idler-friendly mechanics help you stay competitive.

  • No end-game grind. Community-driven narratives & roguelite progression keep it fresh.

  • No micromanagement overload. Master complex systems with delegation & automation.

  • No AI predictability. Outsmart or cooperate with real players in dynamic worlds.

Inspired by classics like Lords of the Realm, Genesia, and Crusader Kings, as well as the social depth of early CRPG MUSHes and classic board games, it comes to life through hand-crafted visuals and an evocative soundtrack. Fully customizable, built for and alongside the community.

... AT YOUR OWN PACE

Play casually or dive in as a hardcore player. Climb the feudal ladder — or shake it — through a dynamic vassal system where everyone has a role. Give instructions to your armies, fiefdoms and serfs to handle affairs in your absence. Let your court prepare administrative reserves, ensuring your realm is ready for your commands when you return.

... THROUGH YOUR OWN ACHIEVEMENTS

The asynchronous, tick-based system gives you all the time to craft masterful strategies in a living, breathing world. Feudums is built for fair play — every player stands on equal ground, with no hidden pay-to-win gimmicks. What else should define a multiplayer strategy game?

... WITH BLOOD AND SWEAT

War is costly, bitter, and leaves lasting scars on your realm. A detailed battle system offers deep tactical choices, with multi-tick battles and long sieges that allow reinforcements to tip the scales. Seasonal military campaigns with levy troops — lances — form the backbone of warfare. Plan your wars on the game map and share your strategies with allies, as alliances and betrayals shape the fate of kingdoms.

... WITH WITS OR SCHEMES

Feudums thrives on a fluid, community-driven narrative system where a single decision can shift the course of history, and you're never the only one trying to shape events. No agreement is set in stone, but breaking them without a solid reason — or a convincingly fabricated one — can backfire, handing rivals control over the unfolding events.

... YOUR FEUDAL SOCIETY

Forge your own feudal network by enrolling others — friends or strangers — as vassals, or swear a carefully worded oath to a liege. As feudal society shifts, new opportunities and dilemmas emerge, but seizing them comes with consequences for all parties involved.

... A STABLE DOMAIN

Ride the seasonal system as it shapes the harsh realities of medieval life — where growth, health, labor, or warfare all shift with the changing seasons. Manage your fiefdoms by building castles in strategic locations, expanding cities, and crafting thriving, specialized, or self-sustaining regions to adapt to the ever-changing circumstances. Oversee your population's needs, guide their life and labor, but remember: winter is always just around the corner!

... YOUR LEGACY AND LORE

Grow your noble house like a sturdy oak, its branches stretching wide with your achievements and nourished by the drops of your blood. Forge your coat of arms from a vast library of historic heraldry, unlocking house traits, heraldic devices, and titles over multiple sessions. Watch your legacy unfold on the very shields you wield, with each device representing different merits, deeds, or stains in your troubled history.

... THE COURSE OF YOUR STORY

Every political decision sparks new dilemmas, opening the door to new diplomatic, economic, and military moves. The dynamic, community-driven social landscape keeps each playthrough fresh, giving you a chance to bend the flow of history to your will. But remember, politics is never a solitary game, and in its tangled web, everyone is a potential target.

... YOUR STYLE

Exert full agency over how you present yourself — and your house — to others. Customize your heraldry, tailor the look of your court and hall, craft your banners, and modify the appearance of your armies, castles, or settlements. While purely aesthetic, these choices let you broadcast your message and personality.

... THE GAME

Designed from the ground up with modding in mind, Feudums offers a wide arrays of customization options, from simple tweaks like toggling features on/off or creating custom rulebooks, to complete game overhauls, such as altering game mechanics or AI behavior. No two playthroughs need to be the same — shape the game to your vision, and share that vision to others!
473750.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 匈牙利语, 俄语, 简体中文

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
